Contributors

Calling all contributors: if you've been missed, now's your chance to get the recognition you deserve. Add your Github profile to the list of contributors.

Sean Callan

Sean has been passionately involved with Elixir since the very beginning. After experiencing the joys of working with Elixir he created Elixir School and has become a core contributor to numerous libraries. During the day, Sean helps companies transition teams and codebases to Elixir.

  • Homepage
  • Twitter
  • Github

  • Project creator

Articles

  • Just the beginning
  • Configuration Demystified
  • Ecto query composition
  • Umbrellas: only when it rains?

George Mantzouranis

George is a software engineer based in Greece who's initial foray into Elixir brought him to Elixir School where he led the translation to Greek. Since joining the team he developed a number of the translation focused features to include the translation report. Being on the learning path, he also decided to contribute back to the community by reviewing the material he uses each time.

  • Twitter
  • Github

Svilen Gospodinov

Svilen is co-founder & CTO at Heresy, where he uses Elixir, Phoenix and the OTP to build and scale the product and services. Whenever he gets a chance, he tries to give back to the open source community by working on open source, giving talks, writing articles and helping beginners.
